function linkWoStatus(wono) {
   url="WO.STATUS.SUM"
   url+="?WONO="+wono
   url+="&OPENED_BY_OTHER_PROGRAM=Y"

   winOptions="width=900,height=500,resizable=yes,scrollbars=yes"
   window.open(url,"Help",winOptions);
}
